messages.title: My Promise
messages.content: After May 2015, if I am elected as your new MP, I will put party politics aside and fight tooth and nail for all of the 65,000 citizens of Northampton North, regardless of who you are, where you came from or who you voted for.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: NO MORE Excessive house building; enough is enough
NO MORE STEM tuition fees; education free at the point of need
NO MORE Excuses; Northampton needs a new hospital
NO MORE Profiteering; gas and electric priced the same for all
NO MORE Minimum wage that people cannot live on. UKIP wants £8.50 an hour.
NO MORE Broken promises; the people want an EU referendum now

issues.brexitEurope: Broken promises; the people want an EU referendum now
issues.economy: Profiteering; gas and electric priced the same for all
issues.education: STEM tuition fees; education free at the point of need
issues.governance: The people want an EU referendum now

issues.socialWelfare: Minimum wage that people cannot live on. UKIP wants £8.50 an hour.

housing.content: Excessive house building; enough is enough

leaflet.personalStatement: I despise elitism in all its forms. I believe everyone is equal regardless of age, gender, race, sexuality and religion.
